title: Disconnect from pvp when crafting hextech key
body: It only happens when I try to craft a key, it does the animation then nothing happens for around 30 seconds then I disconnect from pvp.net then the game closes. I have tried repairing the clients, reinstalling the game, all the different pvp.net disconnecting fixes and nothing works. I find it odd that its only this one specific things that triggers it, the actual game and everything else is still fine.
